description: "Dotted lines and colours divide maritime Southeast Asia into three regions on this map: the Philippine archipelago, Maluku Islands and Sunda Islands. The cartouche features cherub mermaids, and a map of mainland Southeast Asia is on the reverse."
title: "Isole dell'Indie divise in Filippine, Molucche e della Sonda / descritte, e dedicate Dal P. Coronelli, Cosmografo della Sererassima Republica di Venetia."
